title: I'm having trouble downloading League again
body: I started playing league 2 months ago cause my friends told me to and i'm glad i did cause this game is very fun with friends and i wasn't sure how much space this game takes cause teh first time it was decent to update taking like 7 hours with my college wifi. but i recently had to reset my computer to save a lot more space cause osme programs were failing so i should be more organized with my space. and now everytime i swear i tried 5 times i downloaded league it pops up and when it's updating it takes forever like i could leave it all day and it'll reach 38 or whenever it passes that percentage it just says error please try again and when it closes and i open it again it just wont launch and won't take me to the launch or update page at all. if you have any idea or could list what could cause this please tell me.

replies.body:
A lot of the symptoms you brought up have been common among *unstable connections* to our patching servers. I'd strongly recommend finding a place to use a *wired connection* on campus or maybe a friend's house off of campus. Campus WiFi is rarely quick, especially with hundreds or thousands of others using the same network simultaneously.

Let me know if you encounter further issues on another network.
Alright thank you I really appreciate the feedback, Ill be sure to go to a library or use my Home's wifi when I come back for Christmas break and ill be sure to leave enough space for it.
